message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $12,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than $9,000. Could you meet me halfway at $11,000?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for the product. Can you consider my revised offer?
